snippet: Inmates who escaped from a prison in Buenos Aires Province wounded the officers, officials said, as two politicians blamed each other for the breakout.
abstract: Three escaped convicts shoot and injure two traffic police officers at checkpoint 80 miles south of Buenos Aires; fugitives, who remain at large, had been serving life sentences for murder.
lead_paragraph: Inmates who escaped from a prison in Buenos Aires Province wounded the officers, officials said, as two politicians blamed each other for the breakout.

headline.main: Escaped Convicts in Argentina Shoot 2 Police Officers
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Argentina: Fugitives Wound 2 Officers
